version_description:
- New Telegram features now available in Nicegram!
- Fixed bug with annoying notifications.
- Removed libraries that request access to your ad tracking ID.

- New Telegram features now available in Nicegram!
- Fixed bug with annoying notifications.
- Removed libraries that request access to your ad tracking ID.

- New Telegram features now available in Nicegram!
- Fixed bug with annoying notifications.
- Removed libraries that request access to your ad tracking ID.

In this version bugs and crashes were fixed, the problem with the color of the folders panel was fixed, the Skip History setting works again!

Subscribe to our Telegram channel to receive the latest information from the Nicegram team! https://t.me/nicegramapp
